com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.model

Class BucketProtectionConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.cloud.objectstorage.services.s3.model.BucketProtectionConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class BucketProtectionConfiguration
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Represents the protection configuration for a bucket.
